overview: Greg Meinert is the current CIO/CTO for Soshowise Inc. Greg is an industry veteran with over a decade of experience in web development. Greg is a Fresno State Alumni. Greg started his career at age 19 as a webmaster for an institution of higher learning and since then has held the position of CIO for several companies. Greg has experience with start-ups, and in the past has helped raised capital for a previous start-up Civic Path, which is an innovative civic solutions company.
